entry_form.name: AS_GSS_FM_VendorDetailsWrapper
entry_form.description: Interface wrapper to dictate logic for add or update

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!criteria: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getTemp: true,
    getActiveAndInactive: false,
  ),
  local!isCreate: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!vendor),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false
  ),
  local!existingFactorDocumentMappings: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!vendorDocs),
    {},
    rule!AS_GSS_QE_getFactorDocumentMapping(
      documentIds: index(ri!vendorDocs, "evalDocumentId", {}),
    )
  ),
  if(
    local!isCreate,
    rule!AS_GSS_FM_addOrUpdateVendor(
      userAction: ri!userAction,
      vendor: ri!vendor,
      evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
      submissionDate: ri!submissionDate,
      vendorDocs: ri!vendorDocs,
      docsUploaded: ri!docsUploaded,
      criteria: local!criteria,
      factorDocumentMapping: ri!factorDocumentMapping,
      existingFactorDocumentMappings: local!existingFactorDocumentMappings
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_FM_updateVendor(
      vendor: ri!vendor,
      userAction: ri!userAction
    )
  )
)

called_by: AS GSS Add or Update Vendor

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_dropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic single select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic multi select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValues: joinarray(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!value,
    expression: displayvalue(fv!item, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null)
  ), ", "),
  local!i18nData:rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleNames: "AS.CO.CommonObjects"
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValues,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              i18nData: local!i18nData,
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      required: ri!required,
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_paragraphField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard wrapper for a!paragraphField()

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_vendorRecordButtons
sub_interfaces.description: Buttons used in vendor record

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveBackButtons(
  confirmLabel: "Add",
  cancelLabel: "Cancel",
  confirmSaveInto: {
    a!save(
      ri!userAction,
      cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SAVE
    ),
    a!save(
      ri!vendor,
      if(
        isnull(ri!selectedVendorIndex),
        ri!vendor,
        index(
          ri!returnedVendors,
          ri!selectedVendorIndex
        )
      )
    ),
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!vendor),
      a!save(ri!vendor.cageCode, ri!cage),
      null()
    )
  },
  cancelSaveInto: {
    a!save(
      ri!userAction,
      cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
    ),
    a!save(ri!factorDocumentMappings, null),
    a!save(
      ri!vendorDocs,
      rule!AS_GSS_UT_evaluationVendorDocsCancelReconciliation(
        baseEvaluationVendorDocs: ri!vendorDocs,
        updatedEvaluationVendorDocs: ri!updatedDocs
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_writeToDataStoreEntity"(
      dataStoreEntity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_DOCUMENT,
      valueToStore: ri!vendorDocs,
      onSuccess: a!save(ri!vendorDocs, fv!storedValues),

    )
  },
  confirmSubmit: true,
  cancelSubmit: true,
  confirmDisabled: if(
    (ri!isApiCreated),
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!validationMessage),
      ri!searchAction = false,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!selectedVendorIndex)
    ),
    false
  ),
  confirmAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to add",
  cancelAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to cancel",
  backAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to go back",
  backLabel: "Back",
  backShowWhen: not(ri!isApiCreated),
  backSaveInto: {
    a!save(ri!isApiCreated, true),
    a!save(ri!factorDocumentMappings, null),
    a!save(
      ri!vendorDocs,
      rule!AS_GSS_UT_evaluationVendorDocsCancelReconciliation(
        baseEvaluationVendorDocs: ri!vendorDocs,
        updatedEvaluationVendorDocs: ri!updatedDocs
      )
    ),

sub_interfaces.description: Interface to add or update vendor details

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!searchTerm,
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!vendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefVendorDetails(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true()
    ),

  ),
  /*Returns CAGE and DUNS*/
  local!refData: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes(
    refTypes: cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_VENDOR_ID_TYPE
  ),
  local!evaluationWizardStep: 1,
  /*Variable for API results*/
  local!returnedVendors,
  local!cage,
  local!uniqueEntityId,
  local!isApiCreated: true,
  local!selectedVendorIndex,
  /*return the active docs only*/
  local!vendorDocs,
  /*New docs*/
  local!docsUploaded,
  local!validationMessage: if(
    or(
      isnull(ri!evaluationId),
      ri!evaluationId = 0
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_VD_duplicateVendorValidation(vendors: local!returnedVendors),
    ""
  ),
  local!evaluationVendors: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
    rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
      evaluationId: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    {}
  ),
  local!searchAction: false,
  local!errorMessage,
  local!triggerRefresh: now(),
  local!docsUploadedValue,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!vendor.vendorRefId),
      "Add New Vendor",
      "Update Vendor" & " | " & ri!vendor.legalName
    ),
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
        columns: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "NARROW"),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
            contents: {
              if(
                local!isApiCreated,
                {
                  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorInputs(
                    vendor: ri!vendor,
                    validationMessage: local!validationMessage,
                    refData: local!refData,
                    searchTerm: local!searchTerm,
                    searchAction: local!searchAction,
                    cage: local!cage,
                    uniqueEntityId: local!uniqueEntityId,
                    i18nData: local!i18nData,
                    errorMessage: local!errorMessage,
                    returnedVendors: local!returnedVendors,
                    refVendors: local!vendors,
                    showWhen: or(
                      and(
                        local!searchAction,
                        local!evaluationWizardStep = 1
                      ),
                      not(local!searchAction)
                    )
                  ),
                  if(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!returnedVendors),
                    {
                      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_noVendorDetailsBox(
                        errorMessage: local!errorMessage,
                        searchAction: local!searchAction,
                        i18nData: local!i18nData
                      ),
                      if(
                        local!searchAction,
                        rule!AS_GSS_CPS_manualCreateVendorWrapper(
                          isApiCreated: local!isApiCreated,
                          selectedVendor: local!selectedVendorIndex,
                          vendor: ri!vendor,
                          i18nData: local!i18nData,
                          isVendorPresent: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!returnedVendors)
                        ),
                        {}
                      )
                    },
                    if(
                      local!evaluationWizardStep = 1,
                      {
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
                          label: "Select a Vendor",
                          labelColor: "STANDARD",
                          labelHeadingTag: "H2",
                          labelSize: "MEDIUM",
                          contents: {
                            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                              items: local!returnedVendors,
                              expression: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorDetailsBox(
                                vendor: fv!item,
                                vendorIndex: fv!index,
                                selectedVendorIndex: local!selectedVendorIndex,
                                evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
                                evaluationVendors: local!evaluationVendors,
                                i18nData: local!i18nData
                              )
                            )
                          },

                        ),
                        rule!AS_GSS_CPS_manualCreateVendorWrapper(
                          isApiCreated: local!isApiCreated,
                          selectedVendor: local!selectedVendorIndex,
                          vendor: ri!vendor,
                          i18nData: local!i18nData,
                          isVendorPresent: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!returnedVendors)
                        )
                      },
                      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorDetailsEvaluationEntry(
                        vendor: ri!vendor,
                        i18nData: local!i18nData,
                        submissionDate: ri!submissionDate,
                        vendorDocs: local!vendorDocs,
                        docsUploaded: local!docsUploaded,
                        evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
                        criteria: ri!criteria,
                        factorDocumentMapping: ri!factorDocumentMapping,
                        existingFactorDocumentMappings: ri!existingFactorDocumentMappings,
                        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
                        docsUploadedValue: local!docsUploadedValue
                      )
                    )
                  )
                },
                if(
                  local!evaluationWizardStep = 1,
                  {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                      label: "",
                      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                        text: "Create New Vendor Profile",
                        color: "ACCENT",
                        size: "MEDIUM",
                        style: "STRONG"
                      ),
                      align: "CENTER"
                    ),
                    rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorDetails(
                      vendor: ri!vendor,
                      i18nData: local!i18nData,
                      isCreated: true
                    )
                  },
                  {
                    rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorDetailsEvaluationEntry(
                      vendor: ri!vendor,
                      i18nData: local!i18nData,
                      submissionDate: ri!submissionDate,
                      vendorDocs: local!vendorDocs,
                      docsUploaded: local!docsUploaded,
                      evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
                      criteria: ri!criteria,
                      factorDocumentMapping: ri!factorDocumentMapping,
                      existingFactorDocumentMappings: ri!existingFactorDocumentMappings,
                      triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
                      docsUploadedValue: local!docsUploadedValue
                    )
                  }
                )
              )
            }
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "NARROW")
        }
      )
    },
    buttons: if(
      or(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!evaluationId),
        ri!evaluationId = 0
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorRecordButtons(
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        selectedVendorIndex: local!selectedVendorIndex,
        cage: local!cage,
        vendor: ri!vendor,
        searchAction: local!searchAction,
        isApiCreated: local!isApiCreated,
        validationMessage: local!validationMessage,
        userAction: ri!userAction,
        returnedVendors: local!returnedVendors,
        factorDocumentMappings: ri!factorDocumentMapping,
        vendorDocs: ri!vendorDocs,
        updatedDocs: local!vendorDocs
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationVendorsButtons(
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        selectedVendorIndex: local!selectedVendorIndex,
        cage: local!cage,
        vendor: ri!vendor,
        isApiCreated: local!isApiCreated,
        validationMessage: local!validationMessage,
        userAction: ri!userAction,
        returnedVendors: local!returnedVendors,
        evaluationWizardStep: local!evaluationWizardStep,
        vendorDocs: ri!vendorDocs,
        docsUploaded: ri!docsUploaded,
        updatedDocs: local!vendorDocs,
        docsToBeUploaded: local!docsUploaded,
        factorDocumentMappings: ri!factorDocumentMapping,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        docsUploadedValue: local!docsUploadedValue
      )
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_FM_updateVendor
sub_interfaces.description: Interface for user to update vendor information

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!showWarning: false,
  local!businessTypes: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefBusinessType(filters: null),
  local!associatedActiveBusinessTypes: index(
    ri!vendor.businessType,
    wherecontains(true(), ri!vendor.businessType.isActive),
    null
  ),
  local!associatedCodes: local!associatedActiveBusinessTypes.typeCode.code,
  local!newAssociatedCodes,
  local!newBusinessTypes,
  local!newVendorBusinessTypes,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: "Update Vendor",
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorDetails(
        vendor: ri!vendor,
        showWarning: local!showWarning,
        associatedCodes: local!associatedCodes,
        businessTypes: local!businessTypes,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        readOnly: false
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_vendorAddress(
        vendor: ri!vendor,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        readOnly: false
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons(
      confirmAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to save",
      confirmLabel: "Save",
      confirmSaveInto: {
        a!save(
          local!newAssociatedCodes,
          fn!difference(
            local!associatedCodes,
            local!associatedActiveBusinessTypes.typeCode.code
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          local!newBusinessTypes,
          index(
            local!businessTypes,
            wherecontains(
              local!newAssociatedCodes,
              local!businessTypes.code
            ),
            {}
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!vendor.businessType,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!vendor.businessType,
            expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor_BusinessType'(
              typeCode: fv!item.typeCode,
              createdBy: fv!item.createdBy,
              createdDatetime: fv!item.createdDatetime,
              modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
              modifiedDatetime: now(),
              isActive: if(
                and(
                  fn!contains(
                    local!associatedCodes,
                    fv!item.typeCode.code
                  ),
                  fv!item.isActive = true
                ),
                true(),
                false()
              )
            )
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          local!newVendorBusinessTypes,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: local!newBusinessTypes,
            expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor_BusinessType'(
              typeCode: fv!item,
              createdBy: loggedInUser(),
              createdDatetime: now(),
              modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
              modifiedDatetime: now(),
              isActive: true
            )
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!vendor.businessType,
          append(
            ri!vendor.businessType,
            local!newVendorBusinessTypes
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!userAction,
          cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SAVE
        ),

      },
      confirmSubmit: true,
      cancelAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to cancel",
      cancelLabel: "Cancel",
      cancelSaveInto: a!save(
        ri!userAction,
        cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
      ),
      cancelSubmit: true,

    )
  )
)

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_FACTOR_DOCUMENT_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping',
  returnType: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_AGGREGATION,

  executeWhen: or(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds),

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregation"(

          alias: "evalDocumentId"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "factor.criteriaId",
          aggregationfunction: "COUNT",
          alias: "factors"
        ),

      }

    {}

  filters: {

      field: "document.evalDocumentId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!documentIds,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds)

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factor.criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaIds,

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",

      value: true,

    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
expression_rules.description: Concatenates a list into a sentence with a configurable final separator, and/or

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
